pages.text: The flint knife is both a tool and a very simple weapon, though it is only recommended to use as such in the most dire of circumstances.$(br)The real reason to obtain the flint knife is because it can be used to cut grass and other blocks, which will randomly drop plant fibres, necessary to craft a whole host of tools and a partial string substitute.
The flint knife needs to be crafted with a flint shard and a stick.
